ai_feedback.title: Apply to make change to a council flat - Salford - Feedback

feedback.Did the text answer your query?: No, the page only shows 'Apply for it', which isn't helpful without detailed instructions or a proper form.
feedback.Was there anything that could have been: Yes, it needs to clearly explain how to actually apply for permission, including steps, what information to prepare, and how to upload photos or plans.
feedback.Is there any way this text could be impr: Adding a detailed, step-by-step guide with links to the application form and details about processing times would make it much easier for me to know what to do.

ai_issue.title: Apply to make change to a council flat - Salford - Issue

text_improvements.issue: The current text is vague; providing detailed instructions, such as 'Apply for permission via our online form' or including a step-by-step guide, would clarify the process for users.
The blunt phrase lacks guidance—adding information about how to start the application, such as 'Click here to begin your application' and what information is needed, would improve user understanding.
The text does not mention the process for uploading photos or plans, or an estimate of processing times. Including these details would address user concerns about delays and missing updates.

ai_improvement.title: Apply to make change to a council flat - Salford - Improvement

text_issues.Issue: The current text is vague; providing detailed instructions, such as 'Apply for permission via our online form' or including a step-by-step guide, would clarify the process for users.
text_issues.improvement: Apply for permission through our online form on Salford City Council's website. Click here to start your application and follow the steps provided.
text_issues.why: Adding specific instructions and a clear call-to-action makes the process easier to understand and follow, directly addressing the feedback about vagueness.

text_issues.Issue: The blunt phrase lacks guidance—adding information about how to start the application, such as 'Click here to begin your application' and what information is needed, would improve user understanding.
text_issues.improvement: To begin your application, click here and provide details about your flat improvements. Prepare photos, plans, and any important documents needed for submission.
text_issues.why: Providing a direct starting point and listing necessary information helps users understand what’s required, reducing confusion and potential errors.

text_issues.Issue: The text does not mention the process for uploading photos or plans, or an estimate of processing times. Including these details would address user concerns about delays and missing updates.
text_issues.improvement: Upload your photos and plans easily during the online application. Processing times are typically within 4-6 weeks. You will receive updates via email.
text_issues.why: Including details on uploading documents and expected timelines alleviates concerns about delays and keeps users informed, aligning with their need for timely updates.
